page.title: 20The Authors
page.content: The compilers of this document have been children from the local Primary School.Bad weather prevented us from making too many outings in a formal setting but much information has been also gleaned from older relatives. The school consists of some 70 children aged 5-9 years of age,some of whom have their roots firmly fixed in the village and others whose families have moved to the village and fully adopted it but whose parents largely work in Bury St Edmunds,Mildenhall or even further afield.
